mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation by optimizing the layout for smaller screens and reducing the need for excessive scrolling.
loadingSpeedTip: Compress images and implement lazy loading to enhance the page speed on mobile and desktop.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more localized keywords and relevant meta tags to improve search engine visibility for regional searches.
userExperienceTip: Ensure that the content is fully accessible and all interactive elements are clearly visible on mobile devices.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps and offering clearer call-to-action buttons.
tips: Consider implementing a live chat feature for immediate guest support.
Ensure that all interactive elements are clearly visible on both desktop and mobile versions.
Improve the load speed by reducing the number of large files and enabling browser caching.
